id: Do the Work, Overcome Resistance and Get Out of Your Own Way by Steven pressfield.pdf
title: Do the Work, Overcome Resistance and Get Out of Your Own Way
author: Steven Pressfield
description: In this motivational guide, Steven Pressfield explores the concept of resistance that prevents individuals from achieving their goals. He provides practical strategies to overcome mental barriers and unleash creativity, urging readers to take action and follow through on their dreams.
